ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest23.desc: Disposing of Items, Fluids, and Energy safely.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest24.desc: Check JEI @glassential for pane and door variants.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest25.desc: This is just one way to store liquids.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest26.desc: &6Apotheosis&r is a powerful mod that will let you find, and power your gear giving it various modifiers.
To put an gem into your gear with a socket, you will need to use the &9Smithing Table&r.
Use the &9Salvaging Table&r to break down gear with modifiers to get rarity materials.
Use the &9Gem Cutting Table&r to upgrade your gems.
Use the &9Reforging Table&r to give your gear modifiers.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest35.desc: Building tools to help design your base.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest59.desc: Early game piping system for items and fluids.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest60.desc: Purchase Dust from the Market to upgrade your resources to make even stronger gear.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest63.desc: Craft a Gearbox by itself to convert it to a Verticle Gearbox.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest71.desc: The &3Mega Torch&r will block hostile mob spawns from spawning within a 64 block radius.
The &3Dread Lamp&r does the same thing, but for passive mob spawns.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest9.descr: A great way to start getting Fluid XP.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.quest9.title: Basic Mob Grinding
ftbquests.chapter.utility_1.title: Utility
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest100.des: Store the time in this here bottle, then click to speed up entities using your stored time.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest103.des: The tiara has many different varities that you can change between.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest104.des: If you take on the Guardian of Gaia and get enough &3Gaia Essence&r you can make a &3Flugel Tiara&r.
The tiara will allow flight so long as you have access to Botania mana.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest109.des: When you get the materials to craft this, it will let you duplicate quite a few different items.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest111.des: These should get you roughly 500 blocks within range of a Stage 4 / 5 dragon.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest115.des: These wonderful little blocks will let you move up and down between Y levels.  You just need to place 1 Elevator Block down, then another one above or below it.
There can be other blocks in between as well!
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest116.des: These wonderful little blocks will let you move up and down between Y levels.  You just need to place &b1 Elevator Block&r down, then another one above or below it.
There can be other blocks in between as well!
If you're looking for a more aesthetic type of elevator you can check out &6Pneumaticcraft's&r elevator, or &6Create&r's!
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest117.des: Used to attain 1 skill point in the Passive Skill Tree.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest119.des: Used to respec incase you messed up, or want to try something else.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest71.desc: You can now use Create to create power! These machines from Create: Crafts and Additions will help.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest83.desc: Compressed air, tanks, upgrades and more for Pneumaticcraft.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest84.desc: If you ever need to find anything in the world, the &3Scanner&r should be your go to. Just install the proper module.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest85.desc: These gadgets will help change the way you build in Minecraft.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest86.desc: Various upgrades for Industrial Foregoing machines.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest88.desc: Teleport from one stone to other stones you've discovered.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.quest89.desc: Moving Energy, Items, Fluids, and Gas.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_2.title: Utility
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest1.title: Ranged Pump
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest119.des: Auto Crafting withe the Crafter, Mining with the Builder, and fancy screens!
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest120.des: Various modules and crystals for Draconic Evolution
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest127.des: Xnet can help you move Items, Power, Fluids and Gasses.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest128.des: Maybe you want to start setting up your wireless power network?
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest2.title: Better Auto Crafting
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest59.desc: If you need a large boost of power to get you going.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest60.desc: If you need a little extra boost of power to get you going.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest67.desc: Attach Energy I/O Crystals to devices that have power (Solar Panel, Wind Generator, etc).
Change I/O Modes by sneak + clicking.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest68.desc: Send your power into an Energy Relay crystal so you can move your energy around.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest69.desc: Wireless Energy Crystals can be connected to various machines.
ftbquests.chapter.utility_3.quest70.desc: Using Sneak + Right Click you can connect various crystals from point to point.
The Crystal should have a green outline around it as the starting point for connection. Connect to another viable end point.
